description: Boats fishing in Isle of Man waters will have to use designated areas to land their catch.
title: Coronavirus: Isle of Man harbour restrictions on visiting scallop dredgers
title_page: Coronavirus: Isle of Man harbour restrictions on visiting scallop dredgers - BBC News
maintext: Under the changes, crews will be able to land their catches on a one-in, one-out basis but will only be able to step off their vessels to manage their boat lines.
